11113.content:
lets let the story progress normaly MmmKay?





"AGHFLAAAAAAPHAPGHfmmmmmm *dozes off* Zzzzzzz" you say when a small light brown dog with brown ears pokes you with his nose
--dream--
"stop licking me corona or you might lose you apitite heh heh heh"
"oooh your a bit of a niper. well if a was a hot girl with a metal star i would too"
"owww! kay stop now?"
(wakes up)


--real--
"AAAAAGH! A MUT!!!!" you semi-yell
sitting up you see the torn up portable(portable lab) from the lab you were in, sitting in the forest near a river,
"doggie?" you ask. "musta left after i zoned out"
looking at the sky you see the sun is two fingers from setting.
"Better make camp" you say to ReiStark that dumb ass drunk who is alwa...... wait thats you.


after finding your condition suit in the wrecked portable you make a small camofaged camp.
seeing the dog as well kept as is, you surmise that there must be people around, people that may be hostile to you so you activate the remnants of the fluid waming unit and warm your self up before you go to sleep.



snap creak tffff pttt clink
you wake to the smallest of sounds. metal on metal, someone is closing in on you, 4 someones.
you honed your hearing for years and the fact you werent human helped, thank lord for the kritia blood dominating your system. (kritian genes are dominant so human + kritia = 92% kritian 8% human)
hearing whispers you roll carfully to the river next to you and activate your suit. spiishttttttt. you roll in carefully and sink to the murky bottom to hide using the kritia's secret, water breathing (also thin air is no problemo)
after 47 minates you get out and go prone in a ditch only to find a peice of paper with markings on it
PFSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS GAS CAME OUT!
conition suit doing its job you are uneffected and jump to a low branch of a tree.
only to be hit on the back of the head........





you wake to......
11113.title: CAPTURED! REVEL START-O!

111131.content:
"WHO ARE YOU, AND WHERE DID YOU COME FROM!"

you hear after a small amount of cold water hits you. causing you to open your eyes only to see a dark room
with damp brick walls. the only things you can see are three dark figures bloked out by a strong light mounted on a small stand, and 4, wait 5 men in white masks waiting by the door 15 meters away.

???:" WHO THE FUCK ARE YOU, YA LITTLE-" says a female voice
???:" It would be best to calm down Anko" a second but male voice interjects
Anko:" Im getting some water!"
???:" let get down to it ok"
you:" o-ok" *coughs*
???:" im Kakashi. whats your name?"
You:" im not alowed to tell you."
Kakashi:"oh you have orders then?"
you:"im on leave. but still, i have no clue where i am so i cannot tell you"
Kakashi:"ok let go over what we know about you...... *flips open report* you were found in the forrest of death, without ID, you are weaing blue camoflage pants and a black shirt so we must consider the possibilty of you being from the hidden mist villge"
you:" those are my pajamas"
Kakashi:" Pajamas filled with weapons?"
you:" im a Lt, i cant be too carefull
Kakashi:" i don't know that rank but im asuming your importent"
You:" no so much, i've just made some enemys over the years"
Kakashi:" you say you dont know here you are. why?"
you:" i was up late studying on a rainy night when i passed out and here i am"
Kakashi:'does it rain often where you come from?"
you:"yes its like that 70% of the year"
Kakashi:" is the MizuKage still wanking off whalst the 7 swordsmen run about?"
you:" is this some ally code or something. i habe no clue whats going on, and what you are talking about"
111131.title: Every where i go-o. people always ask meh.

1111311.content:
the man looks down and notes all of your emotional gestures. he is obviously is thinking about your story.
"Hmmmmmmmm well its not my call so i will be back in a second" said kakashi walking to a well concealed man in a large round hat
you try to hear them but you must be in a storm drain or something because your hearing is clouded by the sound of running water.
you watch as they keep talking until the third man over you steps forward. you strain to focus on him and immediately wish you hadn't as you see two GINORMOUS EYEBROWS!
"Hmm i see potential in this guy" he whispers (of course you can hear him with your heightened scentses Duh!)
"you like exorcise kid?" he says
you "ummmm i like hiking and sports if that's what you mean"
(obviously guy): "aah. hope it goes well for ya"


'well that "Guy" was weird' you think as he steps back
Kakashi: "Ok hokage but lets be careful"
'oh their done talking' you muse inside
you feel un-shackled and the seal on your chest is ripped off by a white masked man
after the removal of the paper object you feel recharged as if it was suppressing your energy
Kakashi: " lets get you up now"
you feel lifted and still a bit dizzy from whatever they did to you
Kakashi: " you are going to be taken to a high quality containment building so we have to blind you ok?"
before you can answer you get a bag over your head and are lifted up
Guy: "hey kakashi, i bet i can carry him all the way there"
Kakashi: "whatever"
Guy: " if i do you have to give lee a complement. but if i lose i will scale mount konohana with one hand behind my back:
1111311.title: Beleves you (for now) ***

you wake but cant open your eyes at once. grogyness overcomes you and you make a micro-slip into sleep for 3 seconds.
"Rrrrrrrrrgg,"
you wake again and still hear the growls before
"Hey what is it? did you find another racoondog?"
hearing a human voice calms you slightly but you are still in an unfavorable spot
"RrrrrgRr rarg rrr" the creature says back
"a WHAT!?"
"RrrrhRerrrrerrrRrrrhg"
"welllllllllllll....."
out of pure bodley function you cough and saliva splaters your face ..... 'wait do i taste blood' you think

11533222222111.content:
'a-...a girl..... 16?'' you think
The jostle of being picked up quickly moves blood around Your aching boddy and You pass out


****************

"boy this human is heavy for his build" San says
"you sure i can't crush his head and end his suffering now" (for lack of better name) Wolf01 asks
"no we shall see what we can do for him and posably show him to Moro(wolf mother) if its safe"
"you trust these creatures more than what is safe" Wolf01 mumbles

****************

you hear the price is right game over theme in your dream after missing a sniper and being hit

"HHHHHHHHHGGGggghaaahaaakhaaa" you say splatering a small amount of blood on yourself
"i think hes' awake now. hey who are you and why are you here?"
you are laying on a small patch of soft grass as you wake
"RrrrrrrgRRgggRRRhhhhherrrrh" you open your eyes to a large white wolf and a masked girl
"tell us now or he will" the girl says
"i-i- *cough* im na- not sure how i came here"
"what were you doing?!"
"reading and relaxing"
"In the sacred wood spirits forrest?"
"na-*cough* na- no i was in my home and where i ended up is a mystery to me"
"you ended up at the top of a cliff is where and rolled off. i've done some basic healing for you"
"tha-thank you miss from the bottom of my heart...... man those trees are wonderfull, big, green, old, so full of life it's a great sight to behold"
"Huhhhhhhh?!" said the girl out loud "yu-you like them"
"oh yes, i don't see nature like this every day.... im lucky"
"are you lying so i will let my guard down?"
"you've done nothing but nice things for me, why would i want to hurt you?"
"its late. lets get back to mother and see what she thinks (insert wolf's name here)"

sorry i sometimes switch person views Sorry im up late writing and im new so i cant only do what i can (1st to 3rd to 1st changes and so on)
when i put a statment [Like this] Rei it thinking it to himself
and unlike some writers i will not throw some wacko from outside of the story ark in here, so please don't in other adds
K THANKS!




You wake in Your lab on the floor.
*KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK!*
somone with dark red hair enters
"ReI?! are You ok man?"
"Nero?" You reply
"Yah dude you dissapeared for like 10 days"
You look at Your watch that reads 10:37 july 7th
"What day is it" You ask
"The 16th dude" Nero says
confused Rei looked around his lab and saw his clock was white not black, and his guitar was crimson instead of navy blue.
"How long ago did You do Your hair red Nero? I liked the grey" Rei asked.
"What are you talking about? You guys bought Me the hair dye years ago and I kept it like this."
[what the heck?!] Rei said internaly
steping outside his camero was metaltasticly pitch black with his good old.... BLUE TRIM?! [WHERE EZ MAH GREEN TRIM!!!] Rei yelled in his mind
"Im going for a drive" Rei states firmly and hops into his car
"WAIT WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU. AND WHAT ABOUT THE GIG TONIGHT?!" Nero yelled
"string a whole bunch of Dr.who, Back to the future, startrek, neon genisis, stargate, pinky and the brain, devil may cry, steven king, starwars, and judas preist, referances and youll get itttttt!" rei yells as he speeds off


********************************

sitting in a field by his house rei eats his "McFrugels" BigMac
[Whats going on?]
Rei finishes his meal and drink he walked to the old creek in the field. looking up he sees a metiorite [Ahhh all the old days looking at shooting stars and contalations] Rei thinks closing his eyes.
BOOM
looking up rei sees a plate of metal as it smacks him like a trainwreck
[why is shit always exploding on me? cant hold on.... gotta.....hav ta...]
124211.title: YEZ!

1242111.content:
it was cold as two figures looked at a screen on the great fox.
"thats the planet you've been gawking at for the last two days Krystal?!" fox yells
"its the only one with life on it fox" krystal says back feminely
"what! you've gotta be kidding me! all the life is pre-warp. but what would you know about that, your a woman" fox snips
"What did you say! you think boobs make somone an idiot?! they are the only ones for lightyears and we can't fly fox"
"but" fox trys
"BUT WHAT! and for the sexest comment you wont get any dinner tonight!" krystal says
"You talk about being sexest and then talk about making dinner!" fox returns
"OUT!" krystal yells
stoming out fox curses quietly

"lets get back to 'work' now" krystal says looking at the view screen. taping into a signal krystal finds a concert.
"yah got it! now for some (METALTASTIC BAND NAME HERE)"
a young man about 16-17 is playing a guitar and singing at the front. dressed in black with a silver mask ( this one
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs18/f/2007/2... mixed with this http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en... ) with green light coming out its eyes for effect and to hide his face
"what a cutey" krystal says


******13 days later********


both krystal and fox stand by the warp core (i LOVE star trek)
"ok here goes the sinthetic Dylithium" fox says puting in the crystal chunk
"if we made it from our DNA is it a Krystal crystal?" krystal says
"very funny its a Krystal McCloud-stal hahahah..."
the core glows stangly and a wave of light hits both foxes
changing them........



*****************

the next day they both wake up and look at the other

"Pppppfffff"
"WHAT!" fox yells
"HAhahahahaha are you sure every woman is a stupid dinner making machine hehehe" krystal replys
"what are you talking abou..... I HAVE TITS!!!!!" fox bursts out looking at himself
"krystal is that a blaster in your pocket or are you happy to see me?" fox says
"What the" krystal exclaims
"heh heh this could be fun" fox says
"Fox you know i dont like girls. remember the katt incedent?" krystal asks
"but your a dude now! what are you gay?"
"nooo.... but.... if......no......ummmm......technicly yes" krystal says quietly
"fuck" fox curses
"ok lets stop this nonsence! this ship is on its last legs now and we need power! im going to that mine to check for clues now"
little did krystal know that the shuttlecraft was low on energy too and would crash in a field outside somones house



(NOTE: if you cant tell there is gay relationships in this story but is NOT gay porn. if you have some fucking problem with what i like {boys and girls} then FUCK OFF)

1253.title: zelDUH!

info.brief_description: Like "John's F,V,s" read this for Non-macro fun
info.description:
this story is a non-macro tribute to "John's Fantastic Voyages" the jist of the idea is the protagonest is teleported to a fictional world (and does not know the world. so you know the plot but Rei doesnt)

and now to ReiStark
Rei's real name is Marklen Dante Bridges, the name given to him by his father whom he despises. his religeosly given name is Reiura Dante Starkarus (ray-ooh-rah don-tay star-car-us) wich is a mixture of different names from all the points of contact from the reflection of our world (paranormal hotspots in cultures) Rei=japan
Dante=west europe
Stark=east europe
due to a war in the south (caribian war of 2037) he was shiped off to battle in the MetalRaiders sect of the milatary (Un-natural and paranormal spec opps)
the catch is Rei was only 13 and the papers for his consignment were signed by his bastard of a dad (a Colonel 1st class who left Violet/Rei's mother)
after 3 long years of working his way up the ranks Rei is close to geting to his dad who is a traitor who fed information to alk-til-may (caribian terrorests) that let to the deaths of Rei's older and younger brothers (damian 13 / eric 17./ Rei 15)
after his platoon in GreatIguana (east of cuba, look it up here http://www.google.ca/imgres?imgurl=http://davidderrick.files.wordpress.com/2007/09...)
was attacked and killed,
rei was found 4 days after in a pool of blood with a ring of dead solders around him, all with 44.cal bullets in their bodys kill zones. and Rei with the toren roter of a hapatche in his chest.
sent home he invented the QuickSlvR Bio-grid infusion a technology alowing the human body to connect to tech ie, the fact he replaced the braces on his torn lims with the QS-Bg-I. mark 7.79. and now has working feeling prostetics for the torn off bits of flesh (7 fingers, 5 toes, right elbo, and chunks of muscle)
up late after a gig in his metal band he writes a song and types it into his computer and passes out due to U,O,A,O,H,L (Ultra-Overkill-Amounts-Of-Hard-Liqor) knocking a jar of Bio-QuickSlvR on his PC that malfunctioned using the lyrics as command code and QuickSIvR taking the information and reacting to the EMP and warp fields created cousing the warp scanner next to him the release BioFuel at 1.23/GigaWats and the and the Enphronic TaRdiS displacent module to create a split in the QS-Bg-I-EMPs radions at 88/Mps and BOOM! other world warp!




Now for the rules

#1, there are no rules
#2, yes there are
#3, fuck you
#4, no i prefer your mom
#5, im gunna kill you in your sleep
#6, i dont sleep im with your mom porking every night
Ahhhem!
.....
.
#1, if a chapter has 3 stars next to it *** its reserved by me, chapters violating that will be removed
#2, Sex is alowed but it IS NOT the main focal point of the story (love and war is)
#3, no short chapters (try for at least 2 paragraghs.)
#4, no bare chapters (describe what is going on in detail, ie dont put "then he shot you and you died so that was a sad thingy")
#5, no bashing ANYTHING! i don't care if they want to be a girl ,are a fur, gay, or have differing moral opinions, FACK OFF!
#6, ^the wanting to be a girl is not in Rei's charicter so none of that (other people can if it doesent conflict with their personalitys)
#7, sex should not take place till at least 30 chapters from the start of the Trek (not 30 from start of interactive, 30 from start of story)
#8, have fun and all are welcome (gay BI furry lez writers may write in all their glory)
update
#9, Rei is a closet furry (fox)
